effect:
**Renewable** *(If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)*

(1), [REST]**:** Load CARDNAME into target unloaded Ranger weapon you control.
effect_raw:
Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)

(1), REST: Load Amorphous Missile into target unloaded Ranger weapon you control.
name: Amorphous Missile
effect_html: Renewable (If this card would be banished from the field or an intent, put it into its owner's material deck instead.)1,: Load Amorphous Missile into target unloaded Ranger weapon you control.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME**: Target weapon you control gets +2 [POWER] until end of turn. Put a **durability** counter on that weapon.
effect_raw: Banish Bellona's Runestone: Target weapon you control gets +2 POWER until end of turn. Put a durability counter on that weapon.
flavor: Her passion for weapons burned hotter than the very hearth where she forged them.
name: Bellona's Runestone
effect_html: Banish Bellona's Runestone: Target weapon you control gets +2 until end of turn. Put a durability counter on that weapon.

effect: (2)**, Banish CARDNAME**: **Glimpse 2**. Put a **preparation** counter on your champion.
effect_raw: (2), Banish Clandestine Chart: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on your champion.
flavor: The true battle begins long before a single step is taken on the battlefield.
name: Clandestine Chart
effect_html: 2, Banish Clandestine Chart: Glimpse 2. Put a preparation counter on your champion.

effect: As long as you control one or more non-Human Tamer allies, your champion gets +1 level.
effect_raw: As long as you control one or more non-Human Tamer allies, your champion gets +1 level.
flavor: Even the most defiant and untamable of beasts can be swayed with proper knowledge, patience, and respect.
name: Cowl of the Wild
effect_html: As long as you control one or more non-Human Tamer allies, your champion gets +1 level.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME**: Allies you control get +1 [POWER] until end of turn. Activate this ability only if each opponent controls no allies.
effect_raw: Banish Duxal Proclamation: Allies you control get +1 POWER until end of turn. Activate this ability only if each opponent controls no allies.
flavor: A war chant passed down through generations, said to ignite courage and inspire unwavering resolve in all who hear it.
name: Duxal Proclamation
effect_html: Banish Duxal Proclamation: Allies you control get +1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if each opponent controls no allies.

effect: Whenever an ally you control dies, put a **refinement** counter on CARDNAME. Then if there are three or more **refinement** counters on CARDNAME, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever an ally you control dies, put a refinement counter on Etherealys' Promise. Then if there are three or more refinement counters on Etherealys' Promise, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.
name: Etherealys' Promise
effect_html: Whenever an ally you control dies, put a refinement counter on Etherealys' Promise. Then if there are three or more refinement counters on Etherealys' Promise, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.

effect: [REST]**:** Target non-Human ally gets +1 [POWER] until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you have two or more non-Human ally cards in your graveyard.
effect_raw: REST: Target non-Human ally gets +1 POWER until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you have two or more non-Human ally cards in your graveyard.
flavor: Those who frequent the forests know how to communicate with its inhabitants. For example, moving the hand in a wave motion attracts squirrels.
name: Fauna Friend
effect_html: : Target non-Human ally gets +1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you have two or more non-Human ally cards in your graveyard.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME**: **Empower 2**. *(The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)*
effect_raw: Banish Gem of Sorority: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)
flavor: Most mages of old scoffed at the new magic the sisters created, but their mischievous innovations have since enlightened many of today's champions.
name: Gem of Sorority
effect_html: Banish Gem of Sorority: Empower 2. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +2 level.)

effect: (1), [REST]**: Empower 1**. *(The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +1 level.)*
effect_raw: (1), REST: Empower 1. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +1 level.)
flavor: They say the Exarch of Light drew crowds during Revelfest, but the goddess hasn't appeared since, leaving many more curious to see for themselves.
name: Gossamer Staff
effect_html: 1,: Empower 1. (The next Spell card you activate this turn activates and resolves as if your champion got +1 level.)

effect: **Banish CARDNAME**: **Glimpse 3**. *(To **glimpse**, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)*
effect_raw: Banish Halcyon Prism: Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
flavor: Many seek to see the future, yet are unprepared for the truths they'll uncover.
name: Halcyon Prism
effect_html: Banish Halcyon Prism: Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)

effect: [Level 2+] (3)**,** [REST]**:** Put a **buff** counter on target non-Human ally you control. *(Allies get +1 [POWER] and +1 [LIFE] for each **buff** counter on them.)*
effect_raw: [Level 2+] (3), REST: Put a buff counter on target non-Human ally you control. (Allies get +1 POWER and +1 LIFE for each buff counter on them.)
flavor: The path of a god is one of glory but also one of solitude.  Those who ascend to the highest peaks hold dear the bonds they cherish.
name: Intwined Bangle
effect_html: Level 2+ 3,: Put a buff counter on target non-Human ally you control. (Allies get +1 and +1 for each buff counter on them.)

effect: **Banish CARDNAME**: Target unit gains **true sight** until end of turn. *(Units with **true sight** can attack units with **stealth**.)*
effect_raw: Banish Marksman's Charm: Target unit gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)
flavor: With the divine blessing from the goddess of hunt, every shot is sure to find its mark with unwavering certainty.
name: Marksman's Charm
effect_html: Banish Marksman's Charm: Target unit gains true sight until end of turn. (Units with true sight can attack units with stealth.)

effect: **Remove a preparation counter from your champion:** CARDNAME gets +1 [POWER] until end of turn.
effect_raw: Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Naga's Fang gets +1 POWER until end of turn.
flavor: Sharper yet are the fangs of the serpent god, wielder of chaos.
name: Naga's Fang
effect_html: Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Naga's Fang gets +1 until end of turn.

effect: **Banish CARDNAME:** You gain **agility 3** for this turn. Activate this ability only at slow speed. *(**Agility 3** — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)*
effect_raw: Banish Ninja Tabi: You gain agility 3 for this turn. Activate this ability only at slow speed. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)
flavor: It is the Inari way.
name: Ninja Tabi
effect_html: Banish Ninja Tabi: You gain agility 3 for this turn. Activate this ability only at slow speed. (Agility 3 — Return three cards from your memory to your hand at the beginning of the end phase.)

effect: As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay (3).
effect_raw: As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay (3).
flavor: Power comes with a price.
name: Oathbreaker's Justice
effect_html: As an additional cost to use this weapon for an attack, pay 3.

effect:
**Ally Link** *(This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)*

(2): Linked ally gains **stealth** until end of turn. *(This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by **true sight**.)*
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

(2): Linked ally gains stealth until end of turn. (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)
name: Phantom Veil
effect_html: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)2: Linked ally gains stealth until end of turn. (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

effect:
At the beginning of your recollection phase, put an **age** counter on CARDNAME.

**Banish CARDNAME:** Ignore the elemental requirements of the next card you activate this turn. Activate this ability only if there are three or more **age** counters on CARDNAME.
effect_raw:
At the beginning of your recollection phase, put an age counter on Prismatic Codex.

Banish Prismatic Codex: Ignore the elemental requirements of the next card you activate this turn. Activate this ability only if there are three or more age counters on Prismatic Codex.
name: Prismatic Codex
effect_html: At the beginning of your recollection phase, put an age counter on Prismatic Codex.Banish Prismatic Codex: Ignore the elemental requirements of the next card you activate this turn. Activate this ability only if there are three or more age counters on Prismatic Codex.

effect: [Level 2+] [Damage 15+] All elements are enabled for you.
effect_raw: [Level 2+] [Damage 15+] All elements are enabled for you.
flavor: All living creatures, even humans, undergo profound transformation when subjected to immense duress.
name: Prismatic Perseverance
effect_html: Level 2+ Damage 15+ All elements are enabled for you.

effect:
**Ally Link** *(This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)*

Linked ally gets +1 [LIFE] and has **intercept**.
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

Linked ally gets +1 LIFE and has intercept.
flavor: The armor feels fuller with each life that is spared.
name: Protector's Plate
effect_html: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)Linked ally gets +1 and has intercept.

effect:
At the beginning of your recollection phase, if there are less than four **age** counters on CARDNAME, put an **age** counter on it.

**Banish CARDNAME:** **Empower X**, where **X** is the amount of **age** counters on CARDNAME.
effect_raw:
At the beginning of your recollection phase, if there are less than four age counters on Sage's Urn, put an age counter on it.

Banish Sage's Urn: Empower X, where X is the amount of age counters on Sage's Urn.
name: Sage's Urn
effect_html: At the beginning of your recollection phase, if there are less than four age counters on Sage's Urn, put an age counter on it.Banish Sage's Urn: Empower X, where X is the amount of age counters on Sage's Urn.

effect:
Whenever your champion takes damage, put that many **blood** counters on CARDNAME.

**Banish CARDNAME:** Draw a card. Activate this ability only if CARDNAME has eight or more **blood** counters on it.
effect_raw:
Whenever your champion takes damage, put that many blood counters on Sanguine Goblet.

Banish Sanguine Goblet: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if Sanguine Goblet has eight or more blood counters on it.
name: Sanguine Goblet
effect_html: Whenever your champion takes damage, put that many blood counters on Sanguine Goblet.Banish Sanguine Goblet: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if Sanguine Goblet has eight or more blood counters on it.

effect:
**Ally Link** *(This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)*

If linked ally would take damage, prevent 2 of that damage and sacrifice CARDNAME instead.
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

If linked ally would take damage, prevent 2 of that damage and sacrifice Shield of Parvati instead.
flavor: Justice cannot be attained without sacrifice.
name: Shield of Parvati
effect_html: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)If linked ally would take damage, prevent 2 of that damage and sacrifice Shield of Parvati instead.

effect:
*(Bow — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)*

[REST]**:** CARDNAME becomes a weapon subtype of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn.
effect_raw:
(Bow — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.)

REST: Sojourner's Hunt becomes a weapon subtype of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn.
name: Sojourner's Hunt
effect_html: (Bow — Must be loaded to use for an attack and can't be used with an attack card.): Sojourner's Hunt becomes a weapon subtype of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn.

effect: (1)**, Banish CARDNAME:** Banish target card in a graveyard.
effect_raw: (1), Banish Spectral Beacon: Banish target card in a graveyard.
flavor: Illuminate restless souls that linger, haunting those who have wronged them, so that they may at last find peace.
name: Spectral Beacon
effect_html: 1, Banish Spectral Beacon: Banish target card in a graveyard.

flavor: When one begins their journey, they must first master the fundamentals of combat, stripped of ornament or flourish.
name: Training Sword

effect: Whenever you activate a Spell card, put a **refinement** counter on CARDNAME. Then if there are three or more **refinement** counters on CARDNAME, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.
effect_raw: Whenever you activate a Spell card, put a refinement counter on Veilara's Promise. Then if there are three or more refinement counters on Veilara's Promise, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.
name: Veilara's Promise
effect_html: Whenever you activate a Spell card, put a refinement counter on Veilara's Promise. Then if there are three or more refinement counters on Veilara's Promise, you may banish it. If you do, draw a card.

effect: (2)**, Banish CARDNAME**: Target unit becomes **distant**. *(Units stay **distant** until the end of their controller's turn.)*
effect_raw: (2), Banish Winged Talaria: Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
flavor: These enchanted sandals are said to carry their wearer to wherever their destiny calls.
name: Winged Talaria
effect_html: 2, Banish Winged Talaria: Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)

effect: **On Enter:** Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. CARDNAME gains "**Inherited Effect:** This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
flavor: A beautiful dance of color and the enmeshment of elements make manifest its prismatic brilliance.
name: Prismatic Spirit
effect_html: On Enter: Draw six cards then choose two basic elements. Prismatic Spirit gains "Inherited Effect: This object is each of the chosen elements in addition to its other elements."
